definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: Ladies and Gentlemen: there'll be a Chinese music concert.
sentences.chinese: 女士們先生們，一會將有一場中國民樂匯演。

sentences.english: The date and venue of the Annual Concert will be announced later.
sentences.chinese: 週年匯演之日期及演出地點，將於稍後公佈。

sentences.english: There in the center of the display was Roquefort cheese in all its glory.
sentences.chinese: 目前，在中心的大匯演是奶酪查看所有的榮耀。

sentences.english: The festival was the brainchild of Reeves.
sentences.chinese: 這場匯演是裏夫斯的心血結晶。
